About Us

Tax Preparation Services

Looking for the bst tax preparation service for yourself or your business? Fint has been offering professional tax preparation and tax accounting services to individuals and businesses in California since 1971.

Over that time, we have grown from a single-person firm to California's best and most trusted tax firm processing more than 10,000 tax returns annually. We serve clients across not just Los Angeles and California, but nationally.

We are one of the largest and most trusted tax firms in California with more than 500 5-star reviews on Google and Yelp. We have also won numerous awards including winning the Glendaleâ€™s Best Accounting Firm for the 7 years in a row.

Tax preparation is not always an easy task. If you have tried filing your taxes yourself, you have probably learned this. The truth is tax laws are complicated, and even seemingly simple tax returns can be confusing. Even if you utilize tax software programs, it is all too easy to overlook deductions and credits you are entitled to.

A tax preparation service like Fint can be a valuable asset. Our tax preparers and tax consultants can professionally prepare your taxes while offering insights into law changes that might affect you, your business, and your future.

Tax Preparation Service For Businesses And Individuals

Whether you are a full-time employee at a large corporation, an independent contractor, or a business owner; selecting the right firm to prepare your taxes is crucial to getting the most out of your returns. From individual tax preparation to corporate tax preparation, Robert Hall & Associates can help with the following types of returns:

  • Preparation and filing of Tax returns
  • Preparations and drafting of grounds of appeals and representing before different appellate authorities
  • Advising on tax settlement and recovery proceedings
  • Tax planning and advice for individuals,firms and corporate bodies
  • Tax advice to foreign investors investing in India
  • Tax advice to foreigners working in India
  • Tax advice to Indian entity investing/working in foreign countries
  • Advice on Transfer pricing structure.

Maximize Your Tax Returns With Our Tax Preparation Services

Our tax services focus on maintaining profitability and capitalizing on any new opportunities. At Robert Hall & Associates, we steer you closer to these goals with over four decades of experience. Our tax preparers stay on top of the latest tax laws and regulations so you can be confident that you are not missing out on any money-saving opportunities. Our tax preparation services include:

  • Valuation of Shares
  • Valuation of Business Enterprise
  • Valuation of fixed assets
  • Valuation of Brand Equity
  • Valuation of Intellectual property rights

Los Angeles Tax Preparation Service With Audit Insurance

Fint offers clients additional peace of mind with our audit protection program. Our audit protection program takes tax preparation to the next level by including consultations with a tax professional, a W-4 review, financial planning, and more. Contact our office at 824.242.4880 to learn more about our audit protection program.

The symbiotic relationship between technology and human expertise creates a powerful synergy that benefits clients in their financial endeavors.
